title: Classifying: juggling shapes, sizes, colors and textures
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Paul Buchbinder
brief_description: Illustrates the concepts of shape, color, size and texture. Encourages children to recognise that objects have different characteristics or properties. Suitable for lower primary level.
